name: xtejs-detection
description: This package is a library that detects various things such as faces and licenses.

scripts.prewatch: rm -rf dist types && json2module package.json > src/package.ts
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist types && json2module package.json > src/package.ts
scripts.start: ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.json -O '{"module":"commonjs"}' -e "import * as index from '~/index';console.log(index);"

author: Takuya Motoshima <developer.takuyamotoshima@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/TakuyaMotoshima)
